post.body: That's right... No ringing phone, no IM, just me and my long list of to-do items.
I see you up at all hours of the night. I'm usually getting up as you sign off for the day. I bet you're hyper productive.
Working with colleagues in India. Their day = my late night ;)
I'm guessing @eben_pagan is a fake account. @ebenpagan is the genuine article.
Haven't seen any dead bodies in our elevator for a while.
As @jcoronella once said - "there's no minute like the last minute"
I've got the new Killers album in my rotation. I think it's pretty good.
Thanks Johnny - glad to hear you enjoyed it.
LMAO. Let me know if you need help with your invention. The world needs this device!
Congrats! If you do a lot of retail December will be off the chart compared to November.
For tapas checkout the Spanish restaurant on the LV Strip side of the Fashion Show mall (level 2).
Thanks Mike. We'll catch up on @couponpal when you get back from Las Vegas.
Welcome back!
Vertster. I'm testing a new beta. 10x better than Google Website Optimizer. Uses Taguchi testing method so less traffic required
I don't think the Red Ink Project would sell very well...
Get some sleep already!
you need OMS. every sub id is a number. you could have 99 million visitors before you run out.
It's because you're not following me - http://twitter.grader.com/quityourdayjob. You could lift your score at least 0.5% :)
That's why I live in Utah... I don't think I could be productive in SoCal :P
Congrats! Good luck in the finals.
Their defense was stout though.
I can't wait to see your new avatar - http://www.refurl.com/2ym
Game's over. Your upset prediction was wrong. Bring on the Sooners.
PHP Bulletin Board. It's an open source web forum.
Not yet. Did you e-mail me about it? I'm a little behind on e-mail this week - er, I mean month ;)
It's a short 2 hour flight from SLC to SFO. I figured I would save the money on the hotel and fly out in the morning.
I get in tomorrow morning early. You going to the game?
Me too. Alabama hasn't played anyone. Florida is too fast for Bama.
Does this guy look like he's ready to lose to Bama or OU? http://www.refurl.com/2yj.
Tim Tebow isn't great? How can a 07 Heisman winner and 08 finalist not be great? He won't let the Gators lose another game.
Where's your sense of adventure? Take a walk on the wild side :P
Stop drinking the Gator Hatorade. I'll take the Gators over the Sooners. I'll change my Twitter Avatar to OU if they lose.
Yep. 4 per year. It's going to take 8 years to wrap up the tour. Still need to plan game 4 for this year. Maybe Seattle...
I get in Sunday morning. How about a Sunday Tweet Up?
Yes - Dallas will probably be next year. I'm doing 4 per year.
Me too. You need to rejoin the tour!
what wine goes good with a jets loss?
your precious jets are going to lose today. any bets?
your jets look a little rusty today...
sushi - always sushi!
looking forward to Pittsburgh, but im thinking September will be more enjoyable... I saw the Dolphins game on TV last year.
Me too - that's my #2 pet peeve.
Exactly. If it wasn't for Starbucks my car interior would be a lot cleaner.
I admit, I'm a bit clumsy, but SBUX doesn't help when they don't give you any room for error.
looking for cool things to do/see. Will be there for 2 full days.
sounds like you went for PubCon 05?
It will undergo a self correction a la housing, but death to the US dollar? No - your taxes will be 90% before that happens.
Bradford deserves to win the Heisman, but the Gators are going to smash the Sooners in the BCS championship.
Same with the NBA - it's not interesting until spring. Too many games. They need to adapt a shorter schedule a la football.
I have 30 extra reasons (er - pounds) to stay off the sub pilot diet :)
I think Oklahoma and Florida could give Arizona a game.
I see a lot of these sites using Drupal. It's way better than Wordpress, but much harder to learn.
No doubt. I can't believe they don't offer it after all these years.
The Swagg is definitely down this year. Biggest trend I've seen - more emails, fewer snail mail cards.
I haven't made much with Amazon either, but I haven't really tried. I see A LOT of potential though.
Sorry can't jump on the OU bandwagon. I'll be a Utah man until the day I die. http://refurl.com/31i
True - it's always important to root for the conference, but I'm torn - I love watching BYU get beat. What a predicament...
There's a rumor circling that BYU is going to play Oklahoma next September. If that's the case I'll be an OU fan for a day :)
Hook me up Mothner! That's exactly what I need.
I have a bike trainer, stair stepper, and elliptical machine. I really don't have an excuse... Just need to prioritize it.
Good question. I haven't really needed a portable mic. When I go on the road I take my Sennheiser USB headset. Good quality!
Get yourself a Samson CO1U - http://refurl.com/31e. I've used it to record dozens of videos. Makes me sound like a pro.
I use a bean bag. Just enough to make you comfortable, but not enough to fall into a deep sleep.
i'm going to pull a jerry yang and take the shift key off. you can type so fast when you disregard sentence case. will save 10-15 min/day :)
It's an "Excedrin Morning". All Nighter + Heavy Workload = Throbbing Headache
The night shift begins. These are the most productive hours of the day for me.
OMG @ebenpagan is on Twitter. I never thought I would see the day. Down is now up. Right is now left. Nothing makes sense anymore.
One of my goals for 2009 is to finally do something with QuitYourDayJob.tv and QuitYourDayJob.fm.
Trying to get through all my e-mail tonight so I can hit the ground running tomorrow morning. Not sure I have enough caffeine to make it.
After several late nights and long days @couponpal is live - www.couponpal.com.
You know you're up too late when you're listening to the BBC broadcast on NPR.
Heading to Frisco this weekend to watch the Niners/Jets. Game 3 of 32 on my NFL tour.
I work in too many time zones... Welcome to the global economy - where somebody is always awake, which means I am too.
Seems like every application integrates with Microsoft Office. I look forward to the day when every application integrates with Google Apps.
I'm growing tired of PHPBB. I think it's time to start using vBulletin for all my forums. I don't mind paying for something if it's better.
Listening to Garbage - the band.
http://twitpic.com/r0wb - View from Candlestick Park
Just touched down in Frisco. Loking forward to seeing Candlestick Park. Hope I dressed warm enough.
Installed Google Gears this weekend. I'm surprised companies aren't using it more (especially Google). Offline Gmail and Gcal would be nice.
My new #1 pet peeve. People who fill your drink all the way to the top. I'll give up an ounce or two not to spill all over myself.
just booked my trip to the Sugar Bowl in New Orleans. Go UTES! Recommendations for the Big Easy?
Found some nice Web 2.0 icons - http://www.refurl.com/30b/2. They come in all formats and sizes. Using a few of these on QuitYourDayJob.com
One of the smartest AdWords professional's I follow is on Twitter - @bgtheory. Subscribe to his blog for solid AdWords advice.
I have a hard time getting into college basketball before March.
http://twitpic.com/s9hb - When you work as hard as I do you have to eat right.
Auction for a Face:Face video chat with Gary Vaynerchuck. Proceeds donated to charity. Place your bid here: http://tinyurl.com/663cyj
It's so hard to watch Arizona and Denver. Their mediocrity will be rewarded with home field advantage in the first playoff game.
The AFC West and NFC West should be removed from playoff consideration this year. Both division winners will be out the first week.
When it comes to online retail - there's Amazon, then everybody else. I'm going to start promoting them a lot more in 2009.
I see people charging $ for easy scripts. Here's a free PHP contact form. View here http://refurl.com/31g Downoad here http://refurl.com/31h
I would like to thank my friends, family, and colleagues for helping me gain 5 additional lbs this winter. I need a low calorie gift basket.
I love taking naps at the office. It's probably my favorite perk here at Quit Your Day Job, LLC. After 20 minutes I'm totally recharged.
http://twitpic.com/tacx - This image gives a nice summary of the auto bailout. Great find Barry.
